rules_text:
[i]Rat Spirit[/i] – Whenever Hayato, Young Onmyoji attacks, create two 1/1 black Rat creature tokens with “This creature can't block.”
[i]Tiger Spirit[/i] – {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a token: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. Put two +1/+1 counters on that creature.
Partner with Kaden, Refreshed Kitsune [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Kaden into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
